channel.title: Market Potential on FinanClub

item.title: RUM
item.description: score:-6 Chances: Rumble’s strategic partnerships with ACP CreativIT and Qinshift indicate a strong growth potential in the managed service sector. The launch of Rumble CloudTM provides a cost-effective opportunity for businesses to run on a scaled infrastructure, potentially attracting more enterprises to the platform.

item.title: LU
item.description: score:168 Chances: Lufax Holding Ltd is a leading financial services enabler for small business owners in China, which indicates strong market potential. The company’s technology-empowered personal financial services platform offers personal lending and wealth management solutions, tapping into the growing demand for personal finance services in China.
